DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim proposal implement SCNIP 6 Northgate Gonzalez Markets across San Diego , Orange LA county ( 2 county ) , determine level financial incentive rebate ( specifically , $ 10/month , $ 20/month , $ 40/month ) optimally increase purchase consumption SNAP eligible fruit vegetable .
DOC.detailed_description: The University California San Diego ( UCSD ) Center Community Health , collaboration Northgate Gonzalez Markets regional partner , implement Food Insecurity Nutrition Incentive program Los Angeles , Orange San Diego Counties - Southern California Nutrition Incentive Program ( SCNIP ) . This program develop , implement evaluate multi-tiered model enable low-income , SNAP-eligible consumer make healthy food choice purchase fruit vegetable . This model include : tier 1 ) innovative fruit vegetable financial incentive rebate program utilizes consumer 's Northgate Gonzalez Market customer loyalty card , electronic benefit transfer ( EBT ) card , electronic wallet ( e-wallet ) ; tier 2 ) fruit vegetable promotion include discount pricing ; tier 3 ) SNAP-Ed programming ( e.g. , in-store cooking class , tour , healthy food self-labeling system ) educate support purchase behavior SNAP-eligible family . Through use customer loyalty card , EBT card , e-wallet , rebate program able track purchase SCNIP eligible fruit vegetable provide rebate point-of-sale use purchase additional fruit vegetable , thus increase purchase power SNAP-eligible family healthy food option . Earned dispensed rebate dollar store e-wallet enable track purchase behavior dollar spend healthy fruit vegetable program . With data , able determine level financial incentive rebate ( $ 10/month , $ 20/month , $ 40/month ) ( tier 1 ) optimally increase SNAP family ' per caput spend fruit vegetable conjunction fruit vegetable promotion ( tier 2 ) nutrition education activity ( tier 3 ) .
DOC.criteria: Northgate Gonzalez Market customer currently receive SNAP benefit valid EBT card 18 year age old Speaks read English Spanish Shops select Northgate Gonzalez Market regularly , least two time per month Does receive SNAP benefit Unable complete survey English Spanish Another immediate family member live household already recruit study
